entity.name: Loading
entity.description: General issues related to loading page subresources like scripts, stylesheets, and modules, preloading, or loading UX.
entity.descriptionHtml: General issues related to loading page subresources like scripts, stylesheets, and modules, preloading, or loading UX.
entity.descriptionClean: General issues related to loading page subresources like scripts, stylesheets, and modules, preloading, or loading UX.

entity.name: CSS Loading
entity.description: Issues related to loading stylesheets, including render-blocking behavior, asynchronous loading, and unused CSS.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to loading stylesheets, including render-blocking behavior, asynchronous loading, and unused CSS.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to loading stylesheets, including render-blocking behavior, asynchronous loading, and unused CSS.

entity.name: Script Loading
entity.description: Pain points related to loading and executing JavaScript, including `async`, `defer`, ES modules, and dynamic imports.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to loading and executing JavaScript, including async, defer, ES modules, and dynamic imports.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to loading and executing JavaScript, including async, defer, ES modules, and dynamic imports.

entity.name: Loading waterfall
entity.description: Issues around the “loading waterfall” where subresources cannot start loading before their parent resources (present in ESM, CSS imports etc)
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around the “loading waterfall” where subresources cannot start loading before their parent resources (present in ESM, CSS imports etc)
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around the “loading waterfall” where subresources cannot start loading before their parent resources (present in ESM, CSS imports etc)

entity.name: Images
entity.description: Still images across the platform, including performance issues around rendering images on a web page.
entity.descriptionHtml: Still images across the platform, including performance issues around rendering images on a web page.
entity.descriptionClean: Still images across the platform, including performance issues around rendering images on a web page.

entity.name: Responsive images
entity.description: Selecting sources by viewport/container and device characteristics, including issues around related syntax (srcset, sizes, etc)
entity.descriptionHtml: Selecting sources by viewport/container and device characteristics, including issues around related syntax (srcset, sizes, etc)
entity.descriptionClean: Selecting sources by viewport/container and device characteristics, including issues around related syntax (srcset, sizes, etc)

entity.name: Raster Images
entity.description: Performance issues around rendering raster images on a web page.
entity.descriptionHtml: Performance issues around rendering raster images on a web page.
entity.descriptionClean: Performance issues around rendering raster images on a web page.

entity.name: Image loading
entity.description: Fetching/decoding/display strategies for images, strategies to make image loading appear smoother, lazy loading etc
entity.descriptionHtml: Fetching/decoding/display strategies for images, strategies to make image loading appear smoother, lazy loading etc
entity.descriptionClean: Fetching/decoding/display strategies for images, strategies to make image loading appear smoother, lazy loading etc

entity.name: Image formats
entity.description: Encoders/codecs/containers supported by the web.
entity.descriptionHtml: Encoders/codecs/containers supported by the web.
entity.descriptionClean: Encoders/codecs/containers supported by the web.

entity.name: Framework compatibility
entity.description: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around compatibility with JS frameworks.

entity.name: React compatibility
entity.description: Issues around compatibility with React.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around compatibility with React.

entity.name: Third-party Scripts
entity.description: Issues caused by scripts not authored by the site owner, such as analytics, ads, trackers, and customer support widgets.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues caused by scripts not authored by the site owner, such as analytics, ads, trackers, and customer support widgets.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues caused by scripts not authored by the site owner, such as analytics, ads, trackers, and customer support widgets.

entity.name: Tooling
entity.description: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around third party tools, or lack thereof, including tooling in the browser (extensions, devtools, etc.).

entity.name: Performance profiling tools
entity.description: Issues related to choosing and using tools that measure performance or report performance issues.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to choosing and using tools that measure performance or report performance issues.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to choosing and using tools that measure performance or report performance issues.

entity.name: Low quality results
entity.description: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Fidelity issues that are outside the developer’s control or API limitations making it hard to produce high-fidelity results. E.g. rendering is too low quality, low dpi, blurry, browser-generated UI is poor or ugly, etc.

entity.name: Rendering
entity.description: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.
entity.descriptionHtml: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.
entity.descriptionClean: General issues related to the browser's process of painting pixels on the screen, including layout, style recalculation, and compositing.

entity.name: Virtualization / Windowing
entity.description: The need for or issues with techniques for rendering long lists or large tables by only rendering the visible items (virtual scrolling).
entity.descriptionHtml: The need for or issues with techniques for rendering long lists or large tables by only rendering the visible items (virtual scrolling).
entity.descriptionClean: The need for or issues with techniques for rendering long lists or large tables by only rendering the visible items (virtual scrolling).

entity.description: Performance problems caused by having a very large or complex DOM tree.

entity.descriptionClean: Performance problems caused by having a very large or complex DOM tree.

entity.description: The desire to opt-out of render blocking (usually for stylesheets)

entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to CSS Container Queries, often in relation to other features like responsive images.

entity.descriptionHtml: Lack of documentation or code examples
entity.descriptionClean: Lack of documentation or code examples

entity.name: Core Web Vitals
entity.description: Pain points specifically mentioning or clearly describing metrics from the Core Web Vitals initiative.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points specifically mentioning or clearly describing metrics from the Core Web Vitals initiative.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points specifically mentioning or clearly describing metrics from the Core Web Vitals initiative.

entity.name: Cumulative Layout Shift
entity.description: Issues where the page layout unexpectedly shifts during or after loading, impacting user experience. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues where the page layout unexpectedly shifts during or after loading, impacting user experience. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues where the page layout unexpectedly shifts during or after loading, impacting user experience. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.

entity.name: Largest Contentful Paint
entity.description: Issues related to the perceived loading speed of the main content of a page. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to the perceived loading speed of the main content of a page. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to the perceived loading speed of the main content of a page. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.

entity.name: First Contentful Paint
entity.description: Issues related to the time it takes for the first piece of DOM content to render. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues related to the time it takes for the first piece of DOM content to render. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to the time it takes for the first piece of DOM content to render. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.

entity.name: Interaction to Next Paint
entity.description: Issues related to the responsiveness of a page to user input. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.

entity.descriptionClean: Issues related to the responsiveness of a page to user input. This is a Core Web Vitals metric.

entity.name: Interop issues
entity.description: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).

entity.name: `loading="lazy"`
entity.description: Load certain resources only when needed.
entity.descriptionHtml: Load certain resources only when needed.
entity.descriptionClean: Load certain resources only when needed.

example.codeHighlighted: <img src="picture.jpg" loading="lazy" /> <iframe src="supplementary.html" loading="lazy"></iframe>

resources.title: Browser-level image lazy loading for the web

webFeature.description_html: The loading="lazy" attribute for <img> and <iframe> elements blocks loading the external resource until the user scrolls to that element's part of the page.
webFeature.name: Lazy-loading images and iframes

entity.name: Resource Hints
entity.description:
Begin work on certain resources early to improve performance.
Syntax: `<link rel="pre* | dns-prefetch | modulepreload">`.
entity.descriptionHtml: Begin work on certain resources early to improve performance. Syntax: <link rel="pre* | dns-prefetch | modulepreload">.
entity.descriptionClean: Begin work on certain resources early to improve performance.Syntax: <link rel="pre* | dns-prefetch | modulepreload">.

example.codeHighlighted: <link rel="preload" href="picture.jpg" /> <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/" />

resources.title: Understanding CSS preload and other resource hints - LogRocket Blog
